name: Tiptap the Tadpole vs. the Menacing Cthonic Horde
name_original: Tiptap the Tadpole vs. the Menacing Cthonic Horde
description: Tiptap the tadpole needs to get to the bottom of the pond to find her family, but strange pond monsters want to eat her! In this asymmetrical local multiplayer game, one person controls Tiptap with the keyboard while the other uses the mouse to build monsters to attack her. You can play by yourself too, as long as you don't mind being your own enemy.
